articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: BOJ to tweak policy again to allow 10-year yields to exceed 1% - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Central bank to also take a more flexible stance on JGB buying operations
articles.content: TOKYO -- The Bank of Japan is set to consider a further adjustment to its yield curve control (YCC) framework at Tuesday's monetary policy meeting, potentially allowing 10-year Japanese government bo… [+300 chars]
